text: Hi ,How should I  generates invoice PDF files in Julia ?

elements.text: Hi ,How should I  generates invoice PDF files in Julia ?

text: There are various options, mostly using existing tools. One option is to write a markdown in Julia, and then use pandoc to generate a pdf.

elements.text: There are various options, mostly using existing tools. One option is to write a markdown in Julia, and then use pandoc to generate a pdf.

text: Alternatively, if you know xsl-fo, then using Apache fop is a good option. It's a Java library, so you'll need java installed, but you can interface from Julia via the Taro.jl package.
